utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: God, you're beautiful... why are we fighting this? You know you want it to happen as much as I do.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I want you. I need you. Let me make love to you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don't wanna stand in the way of true love or anything, but I think a canelope might hurt less.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, ehm... I'm... I'm rehearsing my lines. They gave me a big romantic story on Days Of Our Lives. It's the first time my character's got one. I'm so nervous, you know, I really want it to be good!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Woow! I haven't seen you this worked up since you did that dog food commercial and you thought you were gonna be with a real talking dog!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, that was a disappointment... Oh, hey! D'you want to come down to the set and tell me if I'm doing ok?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Are you serious?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! Hey, you just have to promise not to get yourself thrown out again.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, that was an honest mistake!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Right! "Oh my God, is this the men's room? Oh, I feel so foolish, have you always known you wanted to be an actor? "

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, that was an awesome day!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So, do you guys wanna come and eat dinner at the restaurant sometime in the next few weeks?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Sure!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'd love to!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well you can't! We're booked solid for the next month!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I can't give you a massage, because my license has been revoked again!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Phoebe, what happened?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, it was an accident... You know, it's a lot of oil and sometimes the hand just slips!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Have I got a surprise for you! Pack your bags!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh no! You guys aren't supposed to get divorced for 7 years!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What? No, I'm taking Monica to a romantic inn in Vermont!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, good! Ok, good for you! Try to recapture the magic!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, what do you say? Can you get out of work?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, honey! I can't. I was just telling these guys that things are crazy at the restaurant!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Are you really that busy?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, I'm sorry. I really am.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, that's ok. I'll just try and reschedule. Hi, this is Chandler Bing. I made a reservation there and I need to change it. Oh, what do you mean it's not refundable? Can I just come some other time? Oh, can't you make an exception?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Tell them I'm a chef in a big New York restaurant!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And tell them that in 2 weeks I will once again be a masseuse in good standing!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look, this is ridiculous! I'm not paying for that room! Ok? Oh, thank you very much! Yeah, I'm going to Vermont...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, don't worry about it! Just use your travel insurance.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don't have travel insurance.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, this is what happens when people live on the edge!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Why don't you take Ross?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh, don't you think that would be a little weird? I mean, two guys in a romantic inn...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, not if their room has two beds!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I guess... It still seems a little... moonlight boat ride!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey Joey, is this the bed where Olivia lost her virginity?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don't know, but one of the extras sure did! Hey, listen Rach. Thanks again for coming down to watch my scenes!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, please! Honey, just the fact that you want me here to support you, I'm... OH MY GOD! Is that Christian Sanders? He's so gorgeous!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Also so gay!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, in my head he's done some pretty "not-gay-stuff"!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, at the Christmas party him and Santa did some definitely gay stuff!

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: Joey, Joey! We're ready for you!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, wish me luck!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok, not that you need it but good... GOD! Is that Chase Lassiter? He's straight, right?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Rach, I gotta say... if you weren't here wondering if these guys were gay I don't know if I could do this!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I'm sorry, you're right. I'm sorry, good luck!

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: On a bell please! Quietly.. and ACTION!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: OH!

utterance.speaker: Chase Lassiter
utterance.content: You look familiar, have we...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: SSSHHHHTTT!!! He's asking her a question!!!

utterance.speaker: Director
utterance.content: CUT!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: NO! Or, cut! You know, that's your call!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Thank you!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Thank you! You haven't said anything...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh.. please! I-I welcome criticism.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What musician?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And there's a country called Argentinaaaa, it's a place I've never seeeeen. But I'm told for fifty pesos you can buy a human spleen. Humaaan spleeeeen. Ol?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you doing here!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, you said that you had customers lined up in the street, so I am here to entertain!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Great!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah! It really has been great too, you know, some of this people must have seen me play before because they were requesting a bunch of my songs! Yeah, "You suck" and "shut up and go home".

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Listen Phoebe...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You know how much I love listening to your music, you know, but...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But what?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This is kind of a classy place.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ok, say no more.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: : It wasn't just that she was fat, the woman smelled like garbage! Everyone! It wasn't just that she was fat the woman smelled like garbaaaaaage! Classy, uh?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi, Chandler Bing, I have a reservation.

utterance.speaker: Receptionist
utterance.content: Welcome to the Chestnut Inn Mr. Bing, so where are you joining from?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: New York.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: The big apple!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm sorry, he's a little bit wound up, we had to stop at every maple candy stand on the way here.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, I ate all my gifts for everybody.

utterance.speaker: Receptionist
utterance.content: I am sorry Mr. Bing, there's no record of your reservation in the computer.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, that's impossible, can you check again, please?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Check again please!

utterance.speaker: Receptionist
utterance.content: I'm sorry, it's not here.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Not there.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Let me get this straight. I called yesterday trying to cancel my reservation and I was told it was not refundable, then we drove six hours all the way up here and now you tell me that we don't have a reservation?

utterance.speaker: Receptionist
utterance.content: I don't know what to say.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: She doesn't know what to say!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Just give us the cheapest room you have.

utterance.speaker: Receptionist
utterance.content: Unfortunatly the only thing we have available is our deluxe suite, the rate is six hundred dollars.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's insane!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Totally insane. Dude, let's drive home, we'll hit all the maple candy stores on the way back and if... if they're closed maybe we'll tap a tree and make some ourselves.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Does that room have a closet I can lock him in? We'll take it.

utterance.speaker: Receptionist
utterance.content: Great.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What! ? They are totally ripping us off!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Dude, don't worry 'bout it! I know how we can make your money back! This is a nice hotel, you know, plenty of amenities, we just load up on those! Like those apples. Instead of taking one, I'm... I take six!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Great, at a hundred dollars an apple, we're there!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: C'mon, you get the idea, ow-ow-ow we'll make our money back in no time!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Dude, you're shaking!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I think it's the sugar, could you hold the apple?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey, I gotta tell ya, I've been thinking all day about that scene you did, I mean, you were amazing!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, you know, the writing was good, and the director is good, and... and my co-star's good but they're not as good as me!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: God, you have to tell me what happens tomorrow!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ow, I'm just going over the script now! You wanna read lines with me?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Me? Oh, no, I am not an actress.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, all right, I can ask Monica.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh screw her, that part is mine!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Right... ok, so just from the top of the page, right here.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. . Hello Drake, I'm surprised to see you here.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Kiss me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Kiss me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ah, Rach, it doesn't say that!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, I'm saying...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: but, but..

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: just... don't talk...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ehhh, aw! . Well, that's new!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi, this is Ross Geller in suite 206. It seems you forgot a couple of things. Could you have some complimentary toiletries sent up to my room? Thank you! Ok. Toothbrush, toothpaste, razor, mouthwash, deodorant, dental floss, band aids, shaving cream, after shave... and I feel like I am forgetting something... Is there anything else you have that I haven't asked for already? Yeah, go ahead, send up some tampons.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What did you get?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: USA Today

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Nice, put it with the others.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And I also got... two more apples.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We are four short of a bush-o . God I feel so alive, I love being in the country!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I also got this great salt and pepper shaker from the restaurant.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, that's not cool.

utterance.speaker: Chandlers
utterance.content: Dude, none of this is cool.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, Chandler, you have to find the line between stealing and taking what the hotel owes you. For example: hair drier, no, no, no, but shampoo and conditioners, yes, yes, yes. Now, the salt shaker is off-limits, but the salt I wish I'd thought this through.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I think I know what you mean though... the lamp is the hotel's, but the bulbs ... oh, you already got that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Not my first time in a hotel, my friend.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ok, how about this ?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, no, no, you can't take the remote control!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, but the batteries...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Thank you, thank you very much!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Let's celebrate with some maple candy!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: At least tell me where you hid it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Can I ask you a question?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Have you ever had any weird romantic dreams?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Let me think. Oh, when I was younger I used to dream that I got married to Mayor McCheese, and on our wedding night I ate his head.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok, well this is like that... in no way. I had a... I had a dream last night that I wanted to kiss Joey.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow, do you mean like kiss him-kiss him?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yeah! I mean, that was pretty intense.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What do you think brought than on?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don't know! I mean, maybe that's something to do with the fact that I saw him do a love scene yesterday.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: A love scene? With who?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Olivia.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Olivia? I thought she was marrying Connor! Oh right, real life more important.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So do you think that my dream means anything?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I don't know. I mean, you saw him do a love scene, so maybe you don't have a thing for Joey, maybe you have a thing for Drake.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ah! Well it was Joey reading Drake's lines in the dream...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Of course it was! Trust me, when it comes to psychology I know what I'm talking about. I took two psych classes in college.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You took the same class twice.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It was hard!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel and Monica
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Here, Monica, look what I got to wear when I play at the restaurant uh, huh wait! Right? I mean, this might even class up the ballad of the uncircumcised man.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh... Phoebe? Maybe I wasn't clear before. I really love listening to your music here, but my restaurant is sort of an upscale place.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Right, yeah, ok, I'll ask the butler to fetch my diamonds out of the vault.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, it's not what you wear. It's sort of your songs... I just don't think you should play at the restaurant anymore.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, ok. Fine, I'll just, I'll take the hat back .

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, so you guys, the funniest thing happened, at work...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: My songs aren't good enough for your restaurant?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok, we're still on that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I didn't say your songs were not good enough.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Then what's wrong with them? Would they not go with your tiny portions of pretentious food?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Tiny portions?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah well, "excuse me, I ordered the smoked salmon appetizer, but I can't see it, I can't see it"!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, it's not about quantity.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well... it's not about quality.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh really, you want to talk about quality? Have you heard of a key? It's what some people sing in.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well at least all my songs don't taste like garlic. Yeah, there are other ingredients Monica.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ok, so that's what we're doing. You know, when I'm in the coffee house bopping along to one of your songs, I'm wearing ear plugs.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ear plugs, or cloves of garlic?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You know what? I take back what I said before. You keep playing at the restaurant, because with your music driving people inside, my bar sales are going up like crazy.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What are people having, the garlic Martini?

utterance.speaker: Receptionist
utterance.content: Here's your copy of the bill, we hope you enjoyed your stay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh we did, and you still have all your lamps.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, I didn't factor in the room tax.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh dude, don't worry about it, I found an unattended maid's car. We're way ahead of the game.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my god.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: There's something new in the bowl.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look, we have enough, just walk away.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, but I want... I want the pinecones!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: There's a forest right outside.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It's not the same.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ok, go quick!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thank you for a delightful stay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, my maple candy!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Food here at 'Javu'.. will kill you.. the food here at 'Javu' ... will kill you..

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Thank god, it's just you! I thought someone was swinging a bag of cats against the wall.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You'd better get back in that kitchen Monica, the garlic is not gonna overuse itself.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ok, you have to stop playing now.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why? The only person my playing is bothering is you!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh yeah? Ok, let's settle this, come on!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Get your garlic-peelers off me!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Excuse me, excuse me, hi, I'm Monica Geller.. I'm the head chef here.. .. Ok, I was actually expecting a little applause there, but whatever! Ok, quick question: by a show of hands, how many of you were bothered by this woman's singing outside?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ok, ok, how many of you enjoyed the music outside? Ha!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Alright, let me ask you this question: How many of you thought the music was fine, but not in keeping with the tone of the restaurant? .

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ok, well, who identified the tone of this restaurant as pretentious comma garlicky?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ok who thinks the food is delicious and a little pretention never hurt anyone?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ok, well, alright, who thinks the food is fine, the music was fine, but your evening was ruined by this incessant poll taking? .

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Excuse us! Alright here's a question: Who was so worried about her restaurant being fancy that she made a big deal about her friend playing her music and feels really bad about it now?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh... Who was so stupid and stubborn that she lashed out against her friend's cooking which she actually thinks is pretty great!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm sorry...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'm sorry too...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: ooohh... hey! Wanna stick around and I'll whip you up some dinner?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah! As long as it's free! Food here is ridiculously over-p...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Who's hoping the hand raising thing is still cute enough that you won't hate me?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey, do you have peanut butter on the back of your head?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh man! I thought I got it all!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: How... how... ?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I was making a peanut butter smoothy, right?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: uh-huh

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And I couldn't find this little plastic thing that goes on top of the blender... and I thought... well... how important can that be, right... ? Turns out very!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow... definitely just Drake...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What... how is it going with Drake?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh... I don't think it's going very well...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What... that scene I saw was so good!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I'm feeling really insecure about the one we are shooting tomorrow...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey, is this that thing that you do when you say you're bad so I'll give you a compliment?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: A little. Yeah no, I really am worried, you know, I mean I have to make it convincing that I'm in love with Olivia.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So... I've never played that!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ooh! Honey, it can't be that hard, I mean, you've been in love before?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh... well... just once... with you...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok... this could be a little awkward... I'm just going to blow past it... well can't you just use that method actor thing where you use your real life memories to help you in your performance?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What the hell are you talking about? ?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Alright, alright look, just uh... just try to remember how you felt when you were in love, and think about that when you're playing the scene.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh! ok, yeah, I think I can do that. Yeah ok, there's this party scene coming up.. and Olivia and her husband are there and all Drake wants to do is grab her and kiss her, but he can't... And that makes me think about all those times when I wanted to grab you and kiss you, but you didn't know so I would just pretend everything was cool, but really, it was killing me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey, you never.. you never talked about that before...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well.. hey, you know what else I could use? There's a scene where Drake sneaks into Olivia's bedroom, and she doesn't know he's there - which never happened with us! And he knows he shouldn't be there, but he just wants to look at her... you know? And I remember all those mornings before you even put on your make-up, when I would think to myself, my God, she... is... beautiful... and it hurts so much, cuz I knew I could never tell you but it was worth it just to be there looking at you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Thanks dude!!! This is GREAT!!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I got you something from Vermont!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Besides tampons and salt? Ooh! My God! Maple candy! That's so sweet of you. That's weird... it's empty!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi you guys! what's going on, you... you guys wanna hang out... or... ? do you... do you guys hear a buzzing?
